pullrequest.title: copy and paste added to edit menu.

content.raw: looks good. The shortcut key text doesn't align well with the others though. Can you update the `g_copyAct` and `g_pasteAct` to add a call to `setShortcut()` like the QActions in the edit menu and remove the shortcut from the their labels? thanks.
content.html: looks good. The shortcut key text doesn't align well with the others though. Can you update the g_copyAct and g_pasteAct to add a call to setShortcut() like the QActions in the edit menu and remove the shortcut from the their labels? thanks.
